channel.title: Undropable and untradeable
channel.description:
I need help with making items undropable and untradeable...
Anyone have an idea how to do that? please post tut or just telll me for yourself
MSN: Shadows-pking@hotmail.com

item.title: Undropable and untradeable
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

I get nothing for disk returning and item id’s are not in client.java

Crackers well I just don’t know… what code thow?

Read full topic

item.title: Undropable and untradeable
item.description:
@4_2_0 wrote:

Yeah go check in your client.java I suppose and use ctrl + f and search for “crackers” or “disk of returning” OR find their ID numbers and also search for those. Once you find them, find the id number(s) of the items you are trying to make undropable or untradeable, and add the ids to the code. Also you could make another method according to the trading one, should be just a few change of the words, if there is only one of the methods. Hope this works mate.

Read full topic
